= Introduction =

Emcaster is a reliable multicast library written in c#. It uses [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pragmatic_General_Multicast Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM)] for peer to peer reliable multicast.

= Dependencies =

  * [http://www.microsoft.com/net/default.mspx .NET 2.0 or later]
  * [http://www.microsoft.com/windowsserver2003/technologies/msmq/default.mspx MSMQ 3.0] - InstallMsmq
  * Windows 2000, Windows 2003, Windows XP
  * [http://springframework.net/doc-latest/reference/html/ch13.html Common Logging from Spring]

= Features =
  * EmcasterTopics with Regex based Matching
  * Performance - > 100 thousand messages per second on commodity hardware. See PerformanceTuning.
  * Reliable, In-Order Multicast with PGM - WhyPgm
